price: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi atawatimilizia malipo ya vitendo vyao. Hakika Yeye anayo khabari ya wayatendayo.
arabic: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
footnotes: Hapana shaka yoyote kila kikundi katika hawa Mola wako Mlezi atawalipa jaza ya vitendo vyao. Hakika Yeye Subhanahu ni Mjuzi wa ukamilifu wa kubwa na dogo wanayo yatenda, ikiwa kheri na ikiwa shari. Na atamlipa kila mmoja wapo kwa mujibu alivyo tenda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna kullan lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka aʿmālahum innahu bimā yaʿmalūna khabīrun
translations: surely will pay them in full
